## Übung 2

```{python}
students = [
    {"name": "Lukas", "score": 87.5},
    {"name": "Maya", "score": 42.0},
    {"name": "Anna", "score": 59.0},
    {"name": "Tim", "score": 49.9},
    {"name": "Zoe", "score": 100.0},
]

for i, s in enumerate(students, 1):
    if s["score"] >= 50:
        status = "PASS"
    else:
        status = "FAIL"
    print(f"{i:2d} | {s['name']:<12} | {s['score']:6.1f} | {status}")
```

## Übung 5

```{python}
with open("sowpods.txt") as f:
    for _ in range(6):  # skip the first 6 lines
        f.readline()
    counter = 0
    for line in f:
        if len(line.strip()) > 0:  # there are empty lines in the file!
            counter += 1

print(f"There are {counter} words in the Scrabble list.")
```
